statements: DELETE FROM wish_lists WHERE user_id = 1 AND item_name = 'Laptop';
DELETE FROM wish_lists WHERE user_id = 1 AND item_name = 'Book';
DELETE FROM wish_lists WHERE item_description LIKE '%electronics%' AND item_price > 100;
DELETE FROM wish_lists WHERE price > 100 AND user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'john.doe')
DELETE FROM wishlists WHERE user_id = 100 AND wishlist_name = 'Favourites';

DELETE FROM wishlists
WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE username = 'test_user');
